name: Daemonium
description:
There are many risks associated with grave robbing but the pay off is more than worth it.

Daemonium is a top down stealth game where the player sneaks around a graveyard, Collect the treasures scattered around the map and avoid being spotted. The dead don't like being disturbed. After obtaining all the treasures, go back to where you started and use the path to escape the graveyard. 

Controls

WASD - Movement

Space Bar - Sprint
